mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cRequest(emp_no, comment, title, r_date, r_time, com_category) VALUES(#{emp_no},#{comment},#{title},#{r_date},#{r_time},#{com_category})
mapper.select: SELECT c.r_idx, c.reg_date, c.title, c.com_category, c.status, e.emp_no, e.name, e.position, w.w_type FROM cRequest c JOIN working w ON c.r_date = w.work_date AND w.emp_no = c.emp_no join emp e on e.emp_no = w.emp_no WHERE c.status = '대기' AND e.b_idx = #{param1};
SELECT w.come_time, w.out_time, w.w_type FROM working w INNER JOIN cRequest c ON w.work_date = c.r_date INNER JOIN emp e ON e.emp_no = w.emp_no WHERE c.r_idx = #{r_idx}
